Home # Datepicker demo
Component
A native datepicker consists in a simple input type date. Perfect for taking advantage of the device's native datepickers. Try this datepicker's option with a mobile device. A full or "compound" datepicker consists in the combination of month and year selectors along with a Calendar component, for picking the day. Perfect for the selection of dates far in the future (or past).
